price: Akasema: Ee Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika mimi nimewaita watu wangu usiku na mchana!
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا
footnotes: Nuh'u akasema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika mimi nimewaita watu wangu waamini usiku na mchana bila ya kuchoka,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
